component.text: Click to view troubleshooting steps for PPP technology.
Problem: R2 encapsulation was incorrectly configured as HDLC
Step 1: Check that the appropriate encapsulation is in use at both ends.
R2 encapsulation was corrected to PPP. “LCP Open” shows that LCP negotiations have succeeded.
Step 2: Confirm that the Link Control Protocol (LCP) negotiations have succeeded.
Problem: CHAP authentication is incorrectly configured on R1.
Step 3: Verify authentication on both sides of the link.
